TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ColumnAttribute extends System.Data.Linq.Mapping.DataAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class ColumnAttribute Inherits DataAttribute

summary.span: 将类与数据库表中的列相关联。

span.span: Associates a class with a column in a database table.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::Linq::Mapping::AutoSync AutoSync { System::Data::Linq::Mapping::AutoSync get(); void set(System::Data::Linq::Mapping::AutoSync value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration.
The value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanBeNull { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否可包含 null 值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column can contain null values.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此值设置为`false`，相应的列中的数据假定为非 null。If you set this value to `false`, the data in the corresponding column is assumed to be non-null. > [!NOTE] > 此属性已复制属性为方便起见。This property is duplicated from the property for convenience. 方法仅使用属性。The method uses only the property. 为此，你必须指定列是否可以包含中的 null 值属性还。For this reason, you must specify whether a column can contain null values in the property also. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DbType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置数据库列的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the database column.

value.span: 字符串值，该值指定定义 TRANSACT-SQL 表声明中的列的确切文本。

span.span: String value that specifies the exact text that defines the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定 TRANSACT-SQL 表声明中定义的列的确切文本。Use this property to specify the exact text that defines the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration. 指定属性仅当你打算使用若要创建的数据库实例。Specify the property only if you plan to use to create an instance of the database. 默认值来推断成员类型。The default value of is inferred from the member type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL CLR 类型映射](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/sql-clr-type-mapping.md)。For more information, see [SQL-CLR Type Mapping](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/sql-clr-type-mapping.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Expression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否为数据库中的计算列。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column is a computed column in a database.
Default = empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性，当你使用将列定义为包含计算的值。Use this property when you use to define a column as containing computed values. 例如，如果你想要创建作为 SQL 中定义的列`InventoryVal AS UnitPrice * UnitsInStock`，使用以下*表达式*字符串： `"UnitPrice * UnitsInStock"`。For example, if you want to create a column defined in SQL as `InventoryVal AS UnitPrice * UnitsInStock`, use the following *expression* string: `"UnitPrice * UnitsInStock"`. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不支持作为主键的计算所得列。 does not support computed columns as primary keys. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDbGenerated { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否包含数据库自动生成的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column contains values that the database auto-generates.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入的数据行，和的成员是之后可用后，立即同步成员完成。 members are synchronized immediately after the row of data is inserted, and the members are available after is completed. > [!NOTE] > 如果列包含主键值并且指派作为`true`，则还应添加属性使用`IDENTITY`修饰符。If the column holds primary key values and you designate as `true`, you should also add the property by using the `IDENTITY` modifier. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDiscriminator { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否包含 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 继承层次结构的鉴别器值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column contains a discriminator value for a [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] inheritance hierarchy.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`true`，此属性将标识化为保存为具有继承层次结构的鉴别器值的类成员。When `true`, this property identifies the class member as holding the discriminator value for an inheritance hierarchy. 你可以将此属性设置为`true`表示否多个成员，必须属于的最顶层映射层次结构中的类。You can set this property to `true` for no more than one member, which must belong to the topmost mapped class in the hierarchy. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPrimaryKey { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示该类成员是否表示作为表的整个主键或部分主键的列。

span.span: Gets or sets whether this class member represents a column that is part or all of the primary key of the table.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假定一个实体类，必须使用此特性，提供至少一个成员，且它必须映射到的主键或唯一键对应的表或视图中。Assuming an entity class, you must provide at least one member with this attribute, and it must be mapped to the primary key or a unique key in the corresponding table or view. 如果不做此提示[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]要考虑以用于将更改提交到数据库以只读方式类的实例。Failure to do this prompts [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] to consider instances of the class as read-only for submitting changes to the database. 如果你使用此属性指定多个类的成员，该键就被认为是个关联的列的组合。If you designate more than one member of the class by using this property, the key is said to be a composite of the associated columns. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不支持作为主键的计算所得列。 does not support computed columns as primary keys. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsVersion { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示成员的列类型是否为数据库时间戳或版本号。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the column type of the member is a database timestamp or version number.
Default value = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本号将会递增，并且时间戳列会更新每次更新关联的行。Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated every time that the associated row is updated. (此属性获知[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]应更新列以显示它是新版本; 但并不是记录的信息，如谁进行了更新。)(This property tells [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] that a column should be updated to show that it is a new version; it is not meant to record information such as who made the update.) 请注意以下事项时`IsVersion`为 true:Note the following when `IsVersion` is true: - 使用指定正确的修饰符来指定版本数或时间戳列。Use to specify the correct modifiers to designate a version number or timestamp column. 如果不指定，[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]推断出正确的修饰符。If you do not specify , [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] infers the correct modifiers. 版本号将会递增，并且时间戳列会更新每次更新关联的行。Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated every time that the associated row is updated. 具有成员`IsVersion=true`后会立即同步更新的数据行。Members with `IsVersion=true` are synchronized immediately after the data row is updated. 新值是否可见后完成。The new values are visible after finishes. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck UpdateCheck { System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck get(); void set(System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 如何进行开放式并发冲突的检测。

span.span: Gets or sets how [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] approaches the detection of optimistic concurrency conflicts.

value.span: 除非 对某个成员为 ，否则默认值为 。

span.span: Default = , unless is for a member.
Other values are and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性用于三个枚举之一，它确定如何[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]检测并发冲突。When this property is used with one of three enums, it determines how [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] detects concurrency conflicts. 如果任何成员被不设计为`IsVersion=true`，原始成员值进行比较的当前数据库状态。If no member is designed as `IsVersion=true`, original member values are compared with the current database state. 以下枚举有：The following enums are available: - `Always` 始终使用此列对冲突检测。`Always` Always use this column for conflict detection. - `Never` 从不使用此列进行冲突检测。`Never` Never use this column for conflict detection. - `WhenChanged` 仅当该成员已由应用程序时，请使用此列。`WhenChanged` Use this column only when the member has been changed by the application. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#10)]
